players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Alice was killed last night. We need to figure out who the mafia is quickly before they strike again."
Charlie: "I know who the mafia is. Bob is the mafioso. We need to vote him out now to keep the town safe."
You: "I don't know why Charlie is accusing me out of the blue. Maybe he's trying to deflect suspicion from himself as the real mafia."
Charlie: "Bob is lying to sow doubt. I’m the detective and I investigated him last night—he is the mafia. We must trust the investigation and vote him out now."
Diana: "Charlie claims to be the detective and says Bob is mafia. If Charlie is truthful, we should vote Bob. If not, Charlie is suspicious. I suggest we vote Bob to be safe."
You: "Charlie, your story doesn't add up. If you're really the detective, why accuse me so quickly without evidence? I think you're the mafia trying to frame me. Let's vote for you instead."
